definitions: the action of establishing something as a convention or norm in an organization or culture

examples.text: they remain committed to the institutionalization of democracy

shortDefinitions: action of establishing something as convention or norm

definitions: the state of being placed or kept in a residential institution

examples.text: people with a history of long-term institutionalization

shortDefinitions: state of being placed or kept in residential institution

definitions: harmful effects such as apathy and loss of independence arising from spending a long time in an institution

examples.text: a perceptive report worried that J was at risk of institutionalization

shortDefinitions: harmful effects arising from spending time in institution
